caption:
A meaningful last hurrah for @merelyicecream , with this keepsake shirt design created by @lyyeow 👏 👏 

Beatrice is now part of the 美丽俱乐部，大家一起美丽吧🍦!
#merelyicecream #merelyicecreamsg

If you've followed us for a while, you'd know that Oishii Ferments started as a homeschool project in Aug'21, to teach the children how to run a business in this digital era. This past Sunday, we had the opportunity to do our first pop up event at @merelyicecream. What a wonderful real life entrepreneurship learning experience it was for them. Prior to the event, we discussed marketing strategies such as providing free samples of our sourdough (generously) and free flow ice cream toppings to entice customers to our table, pricing strategies, speaking up to explain our offerings, good customer service etiquette, and good hygiene when handling food (wear gloves, etc.). 

We had so many things to prepare and bring, down to tissue paper, extra cooking utensils in case things drop/get dirty, trash can, etc. My sister and I, with three children took a taxi, carrying 4 heavy laundry baskets full of things and a baby stroller (to help us carry some of the things). Lol. I wish we took a picture for memories' sake (totally forgot because we were so busy), because the transport itself was an adventure. 

Six hours at the pop up went by really quickly and we truly enjoyed doing this together as a family. Afterwards when we reflected on the day, I asked the children what they learned and things they could improve on, and we shared our experiences. This, to me, was the invaluable lesson that made all the intense and hectic preparations worthwhile. 

Thank you again for the opportunity, YW and @lyyeow! And thank you everyone who came to support us! What a precious memory.
firstComment: I'm sure your family had a wonderful experience! Love those illustrations too! 👏❤️

🍦 𝗜𝗰𝗲 𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗺 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝗽 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗱𝗼𝘄𝗻!!

📍𝐌𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐥𝐲 𝐈𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦 (𝐒𝐮𝐧𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐞 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐳𝐚, 𝐁𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐞𝐧) 

It’s sad to hear this humble shop leave after 11 years so do head down quick before they close this weekend on 24 Sep! 

𝘿𝙤𝙪𝙗𝙡𝙚 𝙨𝙘𝙤𝙤𝙥𝙨 ($7) 
- 𝙃𝙤𝙧𝙡𝙞𝙘𝙠𝙨 𝙥𝙖𝙣𝙙𝙖: Surprised to find some crushed Hello Panda chocolate biscuits within, a nostalgic yet innovate ice cream flavour full of the wheaty maltiness that reminded me of cereal milk 😋 [8.5/10]
- 𝙎𝙖𝙡𝙩𝙚𝙙 𝙗𝙪𝙩𝙩𝙚𝙧𝙨𝙘𝙤𝙩𝙘𝙝: Their best-seller made with brown butter, brown sugar and sea salt which had a caramel flavour that might be too sweet for us, though we enjoyed the bits of graham biscuits! [7/10]

𝙒𝙖𝙛𝙛𝙡𝙚 ($4) 
- Not the airiest but sufficiently crispy within the first few bites. 
- Wasn’t too sweet which complemented the sweetness of the ice cream. [7.5/10] 

Overall, they’re pretty generous with the ice cream scoops larger than usual and it’s definitely one of the most affordable!

It has given me all the most beautiful things I can ever wish for - the best ice cream, the cutest cat, my loveliest husband and so much love. 

All ready for this Sunday’s live silkscreen. 美丽的你，我们不见不散！🍦

caption:
another food dump ꒰ ˆ ꒵ ˆ ꒱

1: sourdough egg tarts and strawberry yuzu danish. i posted about the egg tarts before so i’ll just talk about the danish, the strawberries were sweet (luckily) and the yuzu filling was tangy hehe 

2-3: made my own bowl comprising of brown rice, soy-marinated tofu, corn, shiitake mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, mentaiko and sesame soy dressing. i haven’t eaten from here in so long but i still consider this place one of my favourites, and i would say the given amount of mentaiko became more generous HAHA 

4-5: lemon delight (with lemon jam), fragola (strawberry) and mixed berries (raspberry, blueberry, blackberry and red currant). very refreshing. the three flavours together gave me summer season vibes for some reason 

6-7: visited on 20/9 before they ceased operations on 24/9. the last time i visited was a couple of years ago and i knew i wouldn’t have time to go again before 24/9 so i got a triple scoop! go big or go home right… i got valrhona chocolate, salted butterscotch and pandan crumble while my friend got hojicha! 

8: chocoladen (chocolatey danish pastry with a chocolate bar inside). nice sweet treats :] 

9-10: my mum came here with her friends before so she brought me here for me to try their food ~ there’s an all-you-can-eat salad bar available with each main course order so we both got a main and salad (its not just vegetables, there’s other food side dishes too). the main course (i got chargrilled sirloin) may look little but the salad bar items made up for it (i think if the main course came with many other things, i wouldn’t be able to fully enjoy the salad bar). my favourites from the salad bar were the sweet potato fries and tofu (slightly firm/crispy on the outside and soft inside)!!
Merely ice cream, but not merely 🍦

24 Aug 2023: #Waffle with #ChocolateStout #IceCream

LAST HURRAH @merelyicecream 
24 SEP, SUN. 12-6PM
美丽俱乐部LIVE SILKSCREEN 

Join me at Merely’s last party before doors closed. My favourite ice cream place is closing after 11 good years. I’ve held my first public workshop here almost 10 years back when starting on my art making journey. It feels special running another pop up this time round, with a special design for Merely, to remember all the beautiful moments shared here. 

We have a little silkscreen booth set up outside Merely on 24 Sept, together with good friends like @oishiiferments, @eccommune and more. Printing on uniqlo tshirts so sizing are universal. Live printing on shirt is $30 each. Please pray for sun and allow time for to dry, or top up $2 and I will mail it to you after! Kindly allow imperfections in printing because I am an imperfect human, but we will all be really 美丽 wearing these tees I promise. 

Join me at 美丽俱乐部 eating 美丽雪糕 for one last time. See you all 🍦

caption:
From its creamy consistency to its unique flavour profiles, we can’t resist an indulgent scoop of ice cream. After all, Singapore’s sun is much more bearable with these sweet creamy creations.

Luckily for us, the island has an abundance of ice cream shops to visit, comprising rows of decadent flavours ranging from classic chocolate to earl grey butterscotch. To help in your hunt for a sweet scoop, we asked the team at Tatler Singapore to share their favourite ice cream parlours to visit to cool down from the blistering heat.

Find out more about the ice cream parlours that offer sinfully delicious sweet creations that are worth melting for.

September is here, it really is.

And so it’s left with 24 days of @merelyicecream. It has been quite a year, watching my other half go through the closure of the first shop, now soon going the second shop. This is also going to be my last window art at this lovely space where we met, where I kickstarted my artist journey and have my first exhibition, where we met Socks and brought her home, where we exchanged vows to be with each other through good times and bad times. 

At home, we sat through the grief of the news, hugged each other tight when tears don’t stop, wished to try harder but honestly, it’s also time to let go and stop fighting so hard for this. 

Reality of putting 11 years of his life in here, there are so many things lost. The headspace, always filled with to dos. Till today, I always remember the moment where we were on the train to Austria years ago and wanted to point out something beautiful for him to see, he was on the phone firefighting and ordering ingredients for the shop, because something ran out. For small business, the person behind it never really rest and stops thinking. And ever since I moved LyttleSpace out, I finally understood how he felt too. Closure of Merely made me more mindful of how I want to live. And now I would push everyone to try to knock off on the dot. To go home, go for dinners, see the sunset in time, experience life out there. Because I am fearful too, if one day the same could happen and what would 11 years means to me then? It cannot be just LyttleSpace, it needs to be full for me to be whole too. 

And he came to a decision to let go. Not fighting anymore to see if it’s possible to reopen a smaller shop, not thinking of an online option, finally not thinking of anything else when Merely serves it’s final scoop on 24 September. Ready to close doors. I guess we will sit through waves of sadness again, yet I am also looking forward for him to live his life and learn new things. Maybe going back to school again to study a new subject 💪🏻

24 days of Merely left. Stock your fridge, fill your bellies, get a Goodbye bag online, come for the closing party! Details coming soon 🍦

@merelyicecream is one of my absolute fav icecream waffles place 🥺💖 LOVE their waffles!!! they’re alw crispy, light & v fragrant. i can finish one myself wo feeling jelak <3 the waffles hardly misses & hits the right spot (unless thrs sth wrong w their machine😅) theyre also affordable :))

been here soo many times & tried LOTS of flavours as well!
1) red velvet cake ; 8/10
love tht it’s not too sweet, thr was tiny cake bits which elevated the texture !

2) green tea ; 6/10
i felt tht it was a little grainy and the flavour cld be more pronounced 

3) white chocolate; 6.5/10
perfect fr those who loved white choco! it was a little too sweet fr me 😅

4)strawberry red wine ; 6/10
this was a seasonal special! wine taste was q strong but not rlly up my alley haha

5)milo fudge cake ; 7/10
perfect fr milo lovers! a flavour tht cant go wrong 😆

6) ispahan ; 6/10
v floral & light but not to my liking

7) dirty chai ; 6/10
i felt tht it was a little underwhelming bc i expected stronger flavours 😓

8) salted butterscotch; 10/10
my ABSOLUTE GO-TO <33 love the sweet n savoury combi !!!! its also one of their best sellers :)

9) valrhona chocolate ; 10/10
love this too!!! v rich & intense dark choco taste 😋 one of the most popular flavours as well!

10) roasted pistachio ; 7/10
i felt that it could be nuttier but overall, still decent 

11) i cant rmb exactly but it was either a mango sorbet kind of flavour or orange meringue but this was q refreshing! 6/10

12) earl grey ; 8/10
intense tea flavours!!!

i rlly love this place a lot but sadly, it’s a little far fr me now :( but they have 2 outlets, tampines hub & sunshine plaza!!! the outlet at sunshine plaza is my go-to bc theres a dine in area & the staffs r friendly too 😮‍💨👍🏻 pls open more outlets in the future!!! perhaps in the north or west area? so tht i can eat icecream waffles even if im at NTU? 😍🥹

First time trying Coffee Mint ice cream! Two of my fave flavors in one and it was nice that both stood out equally at different parts of the ice cream and didn’t cover up one another 😋

#coffeeminticecream
Waffle with chocolate stout and salted butterscotch ice cream ($12)
One of my fav place to chill ~ #gnilrayinoffice2023 their black sesame and chrystenamum are my favourite ❤️

Wanna grab some ice cream?? 🥵
💌
Eat simi: Triple Scoop
Each how much: $9.50
Eat which store: @merelyicecream 
Eat where: Sunshine Plaza, Bencoolen
💌
🧈 Salted Butterscotch: 3.7/5 
My personal go-to classic adorned with sugary-salty brittles with a caramel-like texture. The ice cream was tad bit icy and could be smoother. 
 
🐼 Horlicks Panda: 3.6/5 
A unique flavour not seen elsewhere. The horlicks was a prominent profile here, rendering a malty sweetness and silky texture. Thankfully, it wasn’t as sinful as I thought it’d be as well.

🍵 Green Tea: 3.8/5 
A creation birthed from the partnership with matchaya, this didn’t fail to impress in terms of its flavour. The matcha was not too astringent and not too sweet, though the ice cream could be denser. This would be a good choice for people who aren’t hard-core matcha.
💌
Basic and creative flavours which doesn’t fail, but doesn’t seem to impress too much either. 
💌

Love their ice cream #gnilayinoffice2023 🥰 chill place ~ for lunch ~

One last party at @merelyicecream, and 11 years came to an end in the best ways I can imagine. Filled with Merely friends coming together, the shop is filled with people like the old days, people sharing stories with me on what this place meant to them in their student days, printing days, dating days and so on. It’s beautiful how this humble ice cream shop is the vessel to many of your stories, of waiting, sadness or happiness. Many relationships were forged over ice cream, and more gathering and exchanges on this very last day. Some of you followed my journey with ice cream man from the start of our get together, seeing the addition of mural and window art that brings you a little smile. 

And all of you who are a part of our 美丽俱乐部，thank you for accepting the imperfections in hand printing. I am usually someone who push for 100% with the allowance of time and space, not possible in this pop up setting, but you guys accepted the imperfect prints with grace and love. 

I am the girl who walked into this store 10 years ago, fell in love with the ice cream, then the man whom I married, ate countless tubs and grew fat, also brought Merely’s street cat home and made her family. Merely is very much like all the humans behind this brand, imperfect and beautiful in all their special ways. Despite all the shortcomings, thank you all for loving Merely and holding it a special place in your hearts. For me, it will be special forever and more.

Till the next time 🍦
